juego del orto devs del orto.

Recomendaria sim, inclusive gostaria de deixar uma sugestão que seria pra ajustar o carregamento das partidas, a gente perde mais tempo esperando carregar o jogo do que jogando. Mas o jogo em sim é ótimo!

daddy myers will haunt u if u no buy game
After 300+ hours, I learned how to enjoy the game
что с игрой???или это со стимом проблема?выкидывает,типо нет соединения со стимом!
i couldnt decide between yes and no cuz i play killer but honestly, stay away. fun game you should play it but also dont

This game is not fun anymore and I have been playing occasionnally for the past 5 years. I am not even able to play with my friends anymore.

If you play survivor by yourself be ready to survive alone because nobody will help you. If you are playing killer be ready to get trolled and insulted.

Here is a compilation of most recurrent problems:

* maps are buggy and game crash often
* matchmaking is broken so if you stop playing 2 months, you basically can't play with your friends anymore
* Behaviour broke the rank system (so if you want good loot you need a higher level) which make the gameplay unpleasant, most player will grind: killer will camp hooks and tunnel survivors. Survivors won't help you and will keep doing gens for BP.
* the community is super toxic (if you are a new player, you are going to get trashed for sure)
* Behaviour have a report system but nothing is ever done (so be ready for cheaters and trolls)

Conclusion: keep your money and wait for a competitor to arrive (V H S) before buying. 

You don't know yet and i hope you never will but not buying this game will save you a couple headaches and some sanity.

You're welcome!

Eh um ótimo jogo, porém como todos precisa de melhorias. E algo que faça com que o jogo fique mais emocionante e com mais dinâmicas. Seria maravilhoso que a desenvolvedora ouvisse seus fãs. Mas como disse recomendo, mesmo me estressando as vezes!

刚出的时候就一直有在关注，虽然入手的比较晚。
杀鸡一直在联动，让只有一种游戏模式的它越来越有趣味性，对他的期待值也越来越高。各种技能，地图的不断更新，总是能开发出各种趣味玩法。
非对抗的游戏模式在平衡性上也处理的相当好，玩了一千多个小时了也没有说是玩腻的感觉。虽然有bug但紧改慢改还是修复的差不多了，希望杀鸡越来越好。
If you run the killer for 5 gens and die, was it even skill?

A idéia do jogo em si e boa, porem os assassinos são favorecidos pra caramba e totalmente desbalanceado em relação ao sobrevivente. Alem de tudo os assassinos camperam os geradores e os sobreviventes estão enganchado perde toda a graça do jogo e sem contar as palhaçadas dos aleatórios, te salvam na frente do assassino ou ate mesmo não te salvam.(E porque os assassinos sabem a onde esta os geradores são eles que vão arrumar não faz sentido isso, alem de saber a onde esta a escotilha eles fecham ela isso e outra coisa que não faz sentido, alem de bloquear os portões de saídas, as janelas os próprios geradores cara tudo favorece os assassinos cara)

SE VOCÊ ACHA QUE ESTOU RECLAMANDO DE MAIS VAMOS JOGA UMA PARTIDA ENTÃO
Just dont even try to have fun with this

When I installed the game before dlc "Of flesh and mud" the game was SUPER fun. Since then the game has hit a downward spiral of coddling survivors to the point that playing killer at a high level is near impossible and completely unfun as you have to constantly sweat. But if you play survivor this game is fun and easy in nearly any rank if you have comms, even in solos its pretty easy. Game was great years ago, but no longer
Play this game if you like getting tunneled and face camped just saying...

Play survivor: God the killers are unbalanced 

Play the Killer: God the survivors are unbalanced *but more angry* 

Play the game knowing it's poorly balanced, but fun, and hope that VHS comes out with more balance towards the killer being fun to play. This game you get some fun games as killer, but overall it's exhausting.

I really like playing this game with my friends! I'm not a hardcore player so I don't get hung up on the meta or good perk builds, I just kinda play using whatever I like. It can get annoying with trolling players/killers and I don't know if the reporting system actually does anything, but I recommend and thoroughly enjoy the game!

If you like a challenge and to a game that allows you to take you time to grind for progress, with a large selection of survivors and killers this is the game for you. I played this once on console and got quite frustrated due to the fact that I knew nothing of what the objectives were, how to stall the killer in order to get my teammates to finish their objectives or what perks and items to use. However once I bought DBD for PC my mindset was completely changed. I played along side friends and was able to get a real handle on it. For the first week I played nothing BUT this game it's so addicting.  Granted I'm still not a pro player, but making my way to a seasoned amateur. And the best part is that each game is completely different; there are countless play styles and strategies  that you and other players can use. Updated content is constantly releasing and cosmetic wise this game doesn't disappoint one bit. Now when I say I prefer this game over the Friday the 13th game I really mean it. Its much simpler objective wise making it more of a challenge, but the addition of perks, items, add on's, offerings, and outfits make this game just as complex. I used to play the Friday game constantly and regardless that it's servers were shut down this I would consider this game far superior. 10/10 would recommend to anyone that likes to use their head and make skill based decisions in video games.

This game is so epic. I love listening to Steve Harrington be put on a hook. 10/10 screams, would definitely recommend. He also is very hot in his Scoops Ahoy outfit, 100% would recommend that as well ;)
great game, wish a new version could be made.
살인마가 사람을 죽여야 하는데 개발진이 살인마를 죽이는 게임
Playing survivor makes me want to die
This game is amazing with all around great features and thrills. One of the best games I've ever played. 10/10 would recommend.

lots of campers at lower ranks so just don't take it too seriously and find your own fun because people will be determined to ruin your game no matter what. Fun factor is like quadrupled while playing with a friend though, definitely recommend playing in a group and its almost always a laugh. lobbies sometimes bug like once or twice a session when I queue with my friend but very minor issue.

Really cool game, great themes
However since they have implemented Skill based match making all I see are sweaty players.  I can't have a fun/relaxing game like I used to.  Games tend to be zero sum fun in favor of the killer and it's so easy to run into people who just want to dunk on pubs.  They're making an effort to improve the game but it is an incredibly slow pace in my opinion.  I'm very disappointed writing this because I really WANT to enjoy the game but I'm so out of my depth with playtime it makes it impossible to just play and enjoy.
i would recommand people to play this game because it is fun to play and you have to you skill and that the part what i like about the game
Great game. Even more fun with a party of friends. If your into running away from killers and breaking they ankles this is the game for you!!!!!
Saiam enquanto da tempo pois se vcs viciarem ja era!!!!

Shit game overall. Only fun when playing in custom games with friends. But you can only gain shit when in public matches so that's bullshit. Public matches are complete bullshit. Play as the survivor, killer always wins, play as killer, survivors always win. Ranking system is completely broken. You're a brown rank? Get paired with gold and iridescent. Killers camp and tunnel and cheat, survivors gangbang and use infinite loops. Game isn't fun in any way whatsoever. You get 1 good game every 30 and that's your allowance for the week. Shit game needs alot of balancing
I developed severe depression after playing this game do not buy
I installed this game 2 weeks ago.
One of the best games ever played! A true love and hate relationship tho lol

666 hours played, its a great game to jump on and get some game time, can play with friends and/or random online players, can go solo as a killer, solo as a survivor,  lose a survivor game, get mad, play killer, get revenge. keeps you alert and on edge, ranking system too. you can climb the ranking system on killer and survivor with there own rank. its a game where there is a highskill cap, takes time, which is nice, but also if you're just getting into it, being the stealthy cautious type helps you and the team, all around fun time, and stress releasing.

dislikes,

its a grind to get new killers and survivors, and get the perks you want to play with.
can use money$ and its quite cheap, but without money$ its a grind to get more, and some killers are off limits without any money$.. so you will get a lot of game time out of this game, which is good, but also takes a lot of time. but don't need money$ to play.
very good i play every day i wish i could use my playstation account on pc but oh well

All of my friends hate me now thanks to this game

but i got them bloodpoints for a hatch escape though

El juego estaba bastante bueno, pero el mmr destruye todo, nunca va a poder ser un juego competitivo la gracia estaba en que cada partida no sabias que te ibas a encontrar si survis buenos o malos o un killer bueno o malo, eso hacia que todas las partidas sean diferentes. Ahora mismo si jugas de killer y tenes mmr alto al minimo error perdes la partida y si vas de superviviente los killers son todos camperos y tuneleros.
do you hate yourself?  You'll learn to hate everyone else so much more..
Muito bom, passo raiva o dia inteiro sendo loopado, mas muito bom
it was fun tell sbmm came out now it a sucks and is no longer fun as killer or survivor

Oh no, the internet connection was gone for 0.01 seconds. DISCONNECT. How about a reconnect function, useless devs?

Apart from that:

Is it a perfect game? - No
Is it a good game? - No

игра хороша но, не знаю почему создатели  не сделали изначально того что что  все сурвы висят уже на крюке, ведь зачем тратить время на траканов.  каким бы ты крутым не был,  ты получишь по лицу  или   попадешся на капкан,  а обилки  мана это имболанс,в предачу еще рин и нюрса от которых даже человек с хорошим скилом не убежит не говорю и про людей с клешнями, пока ты будешь крутит 360, твои  3 тимейта будут   либо афк либо светить в друг друга фонариками. а пинг? думаешь если ты думаешь что ты такой крутой и твой пинг это 10-20 то  молчи, арабы раздающие через картошку с антеной от рации с пиногом 9999 так не думают они пробьют тебя даже что не пробивается. крч на ваш вкус если у вас он есть

Если любишь обмазываться фикалиями тебе однозначно суда(мнение большинства я не из таких) На самом деле игра отличная разрабы постоянно что то делают только не знаю что, играть на раслабоне порой приходится заставлять себя, потому что жопа разогревается до температуры плавления адамантия от твоих "очень полезных тимейтеров" 40 из 10 полезных тимейтеров!
Honestly, a streamer by the name of DuckDan got me into this game. It's so addictive. If you're into spooky shiz, this is for you.
